content:
On Sunday Q4 in San Diego we will be holding a workshop around FHIR QA rules
- what are they?
- why do we have them?
- how should you understand and apply them?
- Are they the final word on FMM QA levels?
- Should we have new ones? drop them?

This will be a FMG meeting (not a tutorial). Co-chairs, facilitators, and FHIR editors (both core spec and IGs) are invited to attend.
